texts.text: Add a new language you want to translate.

Changes successfully saved and user updated.
Default group successfully saved. You need to start a new session now.
Do you really want to delete the eyeOS system?

Do you really want to use the default eyeNav bookmarks?

File cannot be downloaded. Please correct the address.
Language changed. Please restart eyeOS now.
Manage eyeNav's startpage, its bookmarks and search engines
Please choose a command to be deleted.
Please choose a command to be edited.
Please choose a group to delete.
Please choose a group to edit.
Please choose a group to set it as default group.
Please choose a language to delete.
Please choose a language you want to create.
Please choose a language you want to download.
Please choose a language you want to edit.
Please choose a language you want to translate.
Please choose a mirror to be tested.
Please choose a mirror to delete.
Please choose a mirror to edit.
Please choose a user to be deleted.
Please choose a user to be edited.
Please choose the text you want to edit.
Please fill in all needed fields.
Please type a correct group name.
Please type the correct root password to uninstall eyeOS!
Please type the new translation here:
Please use the list of ISO 639-1 codes!
Remove temporary files and folders from your eyeOS system
Sorry, but the file does not exist.
Sorry, the file is not allowed to be a wallpaper.
Sorry, this file is not allowed to be a wallpaper.
Sorry, this page cannot be nentered by the default user.
Sorry, this page is not installed.
Sorry, you do not have permissions to enter this page.
Sorry, you need to login as normal user to enter this page.
Temporary files and folders successfully removed.
The chosen file is no correct eyeNav search engines file.
The chosen file is not a correct eyeNav bookmarks file.
The chosen group is already the default group!
The chosen username is too long.
The chosen username is too small.
The command does not exist yet.
The download of %s will start after clicking OK.%sPlease send your translation to %s%sThanks!

The download of %s will start after clicking OK.%sTo create an .eyepackage file please follow these instructions:%s1. Download the .tar.gz file%s2. Extract the .tar.gz file%s3. Create a .tar.gz file from the content of %s%s4. Rename the new .tar.gz file to %s%sReady!
The eyeOS system was successfully deleted.
The language ID is already in use!
The language's ID could not be renamed.
The mirror does not exist, yet.
The password you typed is not correct.
The username is not supported. Please type another one.
Theme changed. Please restart your desktop now.
There was a problem while deleting the group.
Type the command you want to run at login.
Type the name of the group you want to create:
You cannot delete the default group!
You cannot delete the default mirror!
You cannot delete the eyeBar command!
You cannot delete the root user!
You cannot edit the default mirror!

You cannot save a mirror as the default mirror!
Your eyeOS server does not need to be cleaned.
